title: THE NEW LEVEL | STEPHEN CURRY
description:
Stephen’s upped his game since last year's MVP so much that we had to get with NBA 2K16 to up his game rating to keep up. STARTING THURSDAY AT 6PM EST, FOR 30 HOURS ONLY, PLAY LIKE THE REAL STEPHEN CURRY IN NBA 2K16.

Stephen Curry, the 2015-16 KIA NBA MVP - the first unanimous winner in NBA history.

asset.author: Under Armour

transcripts: Curry from way down south, how does he do it? Curry with a step back 3 are you kidding me! They still have a time out, Curry from the parking lot, history is good the warriors win! [Crowd Cheering] What a shot by Curry, he makes it look so easy.
